title: MAFS' Jessika Power's crush on Cyrell Paule's boyfriend Eden Dally in a lie detector test
text:
She's the Married At First Sight star who lied to Mick Gould and Tamara Joy in order to hide her secret relationship with Dan Webb.

And on Friday, Jessika Power was caught fibbing about still being 'in love' with Dan and having a crush on Cyrell Paule's boyfriend Eden Dally during a lie detector test.

Taking to Instagram, the 28-year-old bombshell shared a clip of the test, in which she was asked controversial questions about her stint on MAFS.

'I'm sweating!' MAFS' Jessika Power revealed she has a crush on Cyrell Paule's boyfriend Eden Dally and still 'loves' Dan Webb in a lie detector test. Pictured using a tightening wand

After being asked if she 'could see herself with Eden', Jessika replied: 'I mean, if Eden's not with that Cyclone Cyrell either... no!'

But the lie detector indicated she wasn't telling the truth, causing Jessika to howl with laughter.

'I would not be with Eden! He can't even pronounce his F's or his S's!' she said.

Savage swipe! After being asked if she 'could see herself with Eden', Jessika replied: 'I mean, if Eden's not with that Cyclone Cyrell either... no!' Eden is pictured with his girlfriend Cyrell

Awkward! The lie detector indicated Jessika wasn't telling the truth, making her to laugh. 'I would not be with Eden! He can't even pronounce his F's or his S's!' she said.

The reality star-turned-influencer was asked if she still had feelings for her second MAFS 'husband' Dan Webb.

'I'm like sweating... No,' she calmly replied, before the detector indicated she was actually lying, promting her to scream: 'I'm not in love with Dan! Hang on. No, no!'

Jessika also denied 'going on MAFS for Instagram followers', which was found to be true.

'As much as you probably all thought I was there for a bit of fame and Instagram, I did go on there to find love. Thought I'd found it - wasn't that a big gee up!' she said.

Are there still feelings? Jessika insisted she didn't have feelings for Dan Webb (pictured) but the lie detector test indicated otherwise

Jessika also revealed she 'intentionally lied' and was 'misrepresented' on MAFS but isn't going on the upcoming season Love Island during the lie detector test.

The test did not get results from heart rates like traditional methods, but rather from one's voice alone.

Although it yielded typical results, the lie detector test was actually an 'adult party game' from Hasbro.
description: She's the Married At First Sight star who lied to Mick Gould and Tamara Joy in order to hide her secret relationship with Dan Webb.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
